Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Amulet, Follower, Spell

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the parent class of all card types Amulet, Follower, Spell. It contains mandatory variables representing the card's current status and original status, getters and setters.
    See Also:
    Leader

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Card.Rarity
      This enum contains all possible rarities for a card.
      static class  Card.Type
      This enum contains all three possible types of a card and their string names.

    • Field Detail

      • BOOST_COST

        private final boolean BOOST_COST

      • boostAmount

        private int boostAmount

      • cost

        private int cost

      • effectToggle

        private boolean effectToggle
        This variable indicates whether certain effects have been triggered already or not. Its default value is true, representing that certain effects can be triggered. It turns false when the effects are triggers, and will only switch back to true when resetEffectToggle() is triggered.

      • fanfare

        private java.lang.String fanfare

      • fieldImage

        private java.awt.Image fieldImage

      • handImage

        private java.awt.Image handImage

      • IS_SPELL_BOOST

        private final boolean IS_SPELL_BOOST

      • isEntranceRound

        private boolean isEntranceRound
        This variable tells whether if the current round is the card's first round on field (entrance round). It has a default value of true, and will turn false at the end of the round. This variable shall not be switch back to true in any cases.

        The variable is used as trigger to some effects that are only active in the entrance round.

        private java.lang.String lastword

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        Card(java.lang.String typ,
     java.lang.String nme,
     java.lang.String lead,
     int cst,
     java.lang.String rar,
     java.awt.Image handImg,
     java.awt.Image fieldImg,
     java.lang.String efx,
     boolean hasSpellBoost)
        This top-level constructor initializes the card object's basic information
        Parameters:
        typ - string representation of the type of the card. It must match with one of the values in Card.Type
        nme - name of the card
        lead - string representation of the leader of the card. It must match with one of the values in Leader.LeaderType
        cst - cost of the card
        rar - string representation of the rarity of the card. It must match with one of the values in Card.Rarity
        handImg - image of the card when the card is in hand
        fieldImg - image of the card when the card is on field
        efx - effects of the card. It may contain multiple effects. They are interpreted by EffectLib later
        hasSpellBoost - true if the card is one of the spell boost type, false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • boost

        public void boost()
        The card's cost will reduce by 1 if it is boost cost type, otherwise boost amount will increase by 1. This method is only valid for cards with spell-boost effects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the card is not spell-boost type

      • changeCost

        public void changeCost(int target_cost)
        Change the card's cost to a specific number
        Parameters:
        target_cost - the target cost
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the target cost is out of range
        See Also:
        MIN_COST, MAX_COST

      • changeEffect

        public void changeEffect()
        This method is specifically designed to changes effects for only certain cards, as effects that changes effects are very rare in game.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the current card is unable to change its own effect.

      • effectActivated

        public void effectActivated()
        Triggered when some special effects are activated on the card. It sets effectToggle to false to prevent unwanted multiple executions of the effects.

      • getBoostAmount

        public int getBoostAmount()
        Returns:
        the boost amount of the card. This method is only valid for spell-boost cards that are not boost-cost type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the card is boost-cost type or the card is not spell-boost type

      • getCost

        public int getCost()
        Returns:
        cost of the card

      • getEffectToggle

        public boolean getEffectToggle()
        Returns:
        the current effectToggle status.

      • getFanfare

        public java.lang.String getFanfare()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered upon usage. This is the only possible effect for Spell.

      • getFieldImage

        public java.awt.Image getFieldImage()
        Returns:
        image of the card when it is on field

      • getHandImage

        public java.awt.Image getHandImage()
        Returns:
        image of the card when it is in hand

      • getLastword

        public java.lang.String getLastword()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered when the card is dead/destroyed.

      • getLeader

        public Leader.LeaderType getLeader()
        Returns:
        the leader type of the card

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        name of the card

      • getOrgCost

        public int getOrgCost()
        Returns:
        the original, unchanged cost of the card

      • getRarity

        public Card.Rarity getRarity()
        Returns:
        rarity of the card

      • getType

        public Card.Type getType()
        Returns:
        the type of the card

      • getWhenAttack

        public java.lang.String getWhenAttack()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered when it attacks. It is only valid for Follower, as only followers can attack.

      • getWhenEnd

        public java.lang.String getWhenEnd()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered at the end of a round.

      • getWhenEntranceEnd

        public java.lang.String getWhenEntranceEnd()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered at the end of its entrance round.

      • getWhenEvolve

        public java.lang.String getWhenEvolve()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered when it is evolved. It is only valid for Follower, as only followers can evolve.

      • getWhenFight

        public java.lang.String getWhenFight()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered when it attacks an enemy follower. It is only valid for Follower, as only followers can attack.

      • getWhenOtherEnter

        public java.lang.String getWhenOtherEnter()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered when any other follower enters the field.

      • getWhenStart

        public java.lang.String getWhenStart()
        Returns:
        the card's effect that is triggered at the beginning of a new round.

      • isAlive

        abstract boolean isAlive()
        This method is to be implemented by all kinds of cards to indicate whether the card is alive or not.
        Returns:
        true if the card is alive (maintain on field), false otherwise

      • isEntranceRound

        public boolean isEntranceRound()
        Returns:
        true if current round is this card's entrance round to the field, false otherwise
        See Also:
        isEntranceRound

      • isSpellBoost

        public boolean isSpellBoost()
        Returns:
        true if the card is spell-boost type, false otherwise

      • passEntranceRound

        public void passEntranceRound()
        Invoked at the end of the entrance round to indicate that it is no longer the entrance round.
        See Also:
        isEntranceRound

      • reduceCost

        private void reduceCost(int change)
        Reduces the card's cost by a specific amount. The lowest possible cost is MIN_COST
        Parameters:
        change - the amount of cost to be reduced

      • resetEffectToggle

        public void resetEffectToggle()
        Reset effectToggle to true. Triggered for some once-a-round effects.
